product_name: Amphipod RunLite AirStretch Go Hydration Belt - Women's
long_description: Designed for easy personalization, the women's Amphipod RunLite Airstretch GO!(TM) hydration belt lets you put the flasks anywhere along the belt for easy access to water during all your long runs. Smooth, stretchy fabric fits snugly aorund your waist or hips; rip-and-stick closure fastens securely. SnapFlasks(TM) click into place on the belt, staying put even as you run over bumpy, uneven terrain; SnapFlasks are easy to remove with one hand. Small pocket can also be placed anywhere on the belt; it's sized to hold your phone, ID, cash or an energy gel. RunLite AirStretch Go hydration belt includes two 10.5 oz. SnapFlask water bottles. Belt accomodates waists/hips measuring 26 - 48 in.
short_description: Designed for easy personalization, the women's Amphipod RunLite Airstretch GO!(TM) hydration belt lets you put the flasks anywhere along the belt for easy access to water during all your long runs.
